dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.enterprise.risk.sec.threat.SecurityThreatIndicator
dataStructure.description:
Activity that by itself isn't harmful, but indicates malicious activity (e.g., a DNS call to resolve a known name known to be bad)

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: SecurityThreatIndicator

child.name: name
child.description:
A unique name for the threat indicator

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
child.label: name

child.name: description
child.description:

This element is generated from an attribute.

This attribute is optional
